chinese: 我(现在)正在清洗我的车
我(已经)完成了我的家庭作业
我们(已经)完成了我们的项目

english: they have gone to the park

chinese: 我(已经)读过那本书两次了
english: I have read that book twice

chinese: 我从这个课程(已经)学到了很，多
english: I have learned a lot from this course

chinese: 你(已经)提高了你的英文
你(已经)提高了你的英文很多
english: you have improved your English a lot
I have visited The Great Wall

chinese: 我(已经)参观过长城两次了
english: I have visited the Great Wall twice

chinese: 我在我的职业生涯里(已经)写，了三本书
english: I have written three books in my career

chinese: 我(已经)教了你我知道的一切
english: I have taught you everything I know

chinese: 我(已经)自学了如何弹钢琴
english: I have taught myself how to play the piano

chinese: 我(已经)在这个城市里居住了
english: I have lived in this city

chinese: 我(已经)在这个城市里居住了，五年了
english: I have lived in this city for five years

chinese: 我(已经)在那个公司工作了
english: I have worked at that company

chinese: 我(已经)在那个公司工作了三，年了
english: I have worked at that company for three years

chinese: 我自从2020年以来(已经)在，那个公司工作了
english: I have worked at that company since 2020

chinese: 我们(已经)学习了英文三年了
english: we have studied English for three years

chinese: 我们自从2020年以来(已经)，学习英文了
